resources.string: Attention: To record your hiking trail, this app needs to access your location while you are using it. This ensures accurate tracking and enhances your hiking experience.
To record your hiking trail, we require access to your location while using the app and permission to send you notifications.

Our mission is to enhance your hiking experience by providing a seamless way to track your journeys and revisit them anytime. We understand the joy of discovering new paths and the importance of preserving those memories.
